channel.title: Need Help with Runserver.bat
channel.description:
Hi this is my first post so dont bitch me out if i do something wrong or dont explain enought Well here we go
i have a server but my friend deleted and now i had to use my backup file and i forgot the code u need for runserver.bat to work i have Jdk 24 and there in my program(86) files its a 317 server and for the edit on it
Thanks

item.title: Need Help with Runserver.bat
item.dc:creator: @II_john_II II john II
item.description:
@II_john_II wrote:

I guess this have to work.

@echo off
color 0a
title YourTitleHere
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

Read full topic
